name: Netgear Nighthawk AX12
details: Wi-Fi 6 router with 12 streams, advanced features for heavy usage, and a powerful 1.8 GHz processor.

name: Asus RT-AX88U
details: Wi-Fi 6 router with 8 Gigabit ports, robust security, and exceptional speed for gaming and streaming.

name: Linksys Velop MX10
details: Mesh Wi-Fi 6 system with coverage up to 6000 sq ft and excellent performance for multiple devices.

name: TP-Link Archer AX11000
details: Tri-band Wi-Fi 6 router with 10 Gigabit ports, designed for heavy gaming and high-speed data transfer.

name: Google Nest Wi-Fi
details: Mesh Wi-Fi system with automatic updates and Google Assistant built-in for smart home integration.

name: Amazon eero Pro 6
details: Wi-Fi 6 mesh router with tri-band performance, designed for high-speed internet and multiple simultaneous connections.

name: Synology RT2600ac
details: High-performance Wi-Fi router with advanced security, QoS, and fast speeds for homes and small businesses.

name: D-Link DIR-3060
details: Tri-band Wi-Fi 6 router with 3 high-performance antennas, offering seamless connectivity for large homes.

name: Ubiquiti AmpliFi Alien
details: Wi-Fi 6 router with a sleek design and powerful mesh system, ideal for large homes with high-speed demands.

name: Netgear Orbi Wi-Fi 6
details: Mesh Wi-Fi system with Wi-Fi 6 technology and a dedicated backhaul for fast speeds and coverage up to 5000 sq ft.
